source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_new table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_new 

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN T1.AppealRefNumber IS NULL
        THEN T3.AllAppealsAdditionalDataID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                             AS AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
    T1.appealrefnumber                              AS AppealRefNumber,
    T1.lastmodified                                 AS LastModified,
    T1.decisiondate                                 AS DecisionDate,
    T1.decisionsubmitdate                           AS DecisionSubmitDate,
    T1.bespokeindicator                             AS BespokeIndicator,
    T1.bespoketargetdate                            AS BespokeTargetDate,
    T1.processingstate                              AS ProcessingState,
    T1.linkstatus                                   AS LinkStatus,
    T1.casecloseddate                               AS CaseClosedDate,
    T1.pcsappealwithdrawndate                       AS PCSAppealWithdrawnDate,
    T1.numberofresidences                           AS NumberOfResidences,
    T1.appealsdocumentscomplete                     AS AppealsDocumentsComplete,
    T1.questionnairereceived                        AS QuestionnaireReceived,
    T1.lpaconditionsreceived                        AS LPAConditionsReceived,
    T1.lpaconditionsforwarded                       AS LPAConditionsForwarded,
    T1.statementsdue                                AS StatementsDue,
    T1.lpastatementsubmitted                        AS LPAStatementSubmitted,
    T1.lpastatementforwarded                        AS LPAStatementForwarded,
    T1.appellantstatementsubmitted                  AS AppellantStatementSubmitted,
    T1.appellantstatementforwarded                  AS AppellantStatementForwarded,
    T1.finalcommentsdue                             AS FinalCommentsDue,
    T1.lpacommentssubmitted                         AS LPACommentsSubmitted,
    T1.lpacommentsforwarded                         AS LPACommentsForwarded,
    T1.statementofcommongrounddue                   AS StatementOfCommonGroundDue,
    T1.statementofcommongroundreceived              AS StatementOfCommonGroundReceived,
    T1.appellantcommentssubmitted                   AS AppellantCommentsSubmitted,
    T1.appellantcommentsforwarded                   AS AppellantCommentsForwarded,
    T1.thirdpartyrepsdue                            AS ThirdPartyRepsDue,
    T1.thirdpartyrepsforwarded                      AS ThirdPartyRepsForwarded,
    T1.sitenoticesent                               AS SiteNoticeSent,
    T1.proofsdue                                    AS ProofsDue,
    T1.lpaproofssubmitted                           AS LPAProofsSubmitted,
    T1.lpaproofsforwarded                           AS LPAProofsForwarded,
    T1.appellantsproofssubmitted                    AS AppellantsProofsSubmitted,
    T1.appellantsproofsforwarded                    AS AppellantsProofsForwarded,
    T1.areaofsiteinhectares                         AS AreaOfSiteInHectares,
    T1.dateofdecisionifissued                       AS DateOfDecisionIfIssued,
    T1.typeofapplication                            AS TypeOfApplication,
    T1.appealsourceindicator                        AS AppealSourceIndicator,
    T1.developmentorallegation                      AS DevelopmentOrAllegation,
    T1.amountdue                                    AS AmountDue,
    T1.sitegreenbelt                                AS SiteGreenBelt,
    T1.lpaapplicationreference                      AS LPAApplicationReference,
    T1.lpaapplicationdate                           AS LPAApplicationDate,
    T1.datenotrecoveredorderecovered                AS DateNotRecoveredOrDeRecovered,
    T1.daterecovered                                AS DateRecovered,
    T1.callindate                                   AS CallInDate,
    T1.caseprocess                                  AS CaseProcess,
    T1.caseworkmarker                               AS CaseworkMarker,
    T1.costsappliedforindicator                     AS CostsAppliedForIndicator,
    T1.level                                        AS Level,
    T1.procedureappellant                           AS ProcedureAppellant,
    T1.procedurelpa                                 AS ProcedureLPA,
    T1.proceduredetermineddate                      AS ProcedureDeterminedDate,
    T1.targetdate                                   AS TargetDate,
    T1.agriculturalholding                          AS AgriculturalHolding,
    T1.developmentaffectsettingoflistedbuilding     AS DevelopmentAffectSettingOfListedBuilding,
    T1.floorspaceinsquaremetres                     AS FloorSpaceInSquareMetres,
    T1.sitegridreferenceeasting                     AS SiteGridReferenceEasting,
    T1.sitegridreferencenorthing                    AS SiteGridReferenceNorthing,
    T1.historicbuildinggrantmade                    AS HistoricBuildingGrantMade,
    T1.incarelatestoca                              AS InCARelatesToCA,
    T1.inspectorneedtoentersite                     AS InspectorNeedToEnterSite,
    T1.isfloodinganissue                            AS IsFloodingAnIssue,
    T1.isthesitewithinanaonb                        AS IsTheSiteWithinAnAONB,
    T1.sitewithinsssi                               AS SiteWithinSSSI,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)                  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.appealrefnumber,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lastmodified,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.decisiondate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.decisionsubmitdate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.bespokeindicator,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.bespoketargetdate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.processingstate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.linkstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.casecloseddate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.pcsappealwithdrawndate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.numberofresidences,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.appealsdocumentscomplete,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.questionnairereceived,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpaconditionsreceived,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpaconditionsforwarded,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.statementsdue,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpastatementsubmitted,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpastatementforwarded,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.appellantstatementsubmitted,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.appellantstatementforwarded,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.finalcommentsdue,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpacommentssubmitted,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpacommentsforwarded,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.statementofcommongrounddue,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.statementofcommongroundreceived,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.appellantcommentssubmitted,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.appellantcommentsforwarded,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.thirdpartyrepsdue,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.thirdpartyrepsforwarded,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.sitenoticesent,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.proofsdue,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpaproofssubmitted,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpaproofsforwarded,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.appellantsproofssubmitted,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.appellantsproofsforwarded,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.areaofsiteinhectares,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.dateofdecisionifissued,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.typeofapplication,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.appealsourceindicator,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.developmentorallegation,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.amountdue,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.sitegreenbelt,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpaapplicationreference,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpaapplicationdate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.datenotrecoveredorderecovered,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.daterecovered,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.callindate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.caseprocess,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.caseworkmarker,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.costsappliedforindicator,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.level,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.procedureappellant,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.procedurelpa,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.proceduredetermineddate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.sitegridreferenceeasting,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.sitegridreferencenorthing,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.historicbuildinggrantmade,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.incarelatestoca,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.inspectorneedtoentersite,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.isfloodinganissue,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.isthesitewithinanaonb,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.sitewithinsssi,'.')
        ))                                         AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y'                                            AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive as HistoricIsActive
    

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_all_additional_appeal T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Casework" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim T3 ON T1.appealrefnumber = T3.AppealRefNumber AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T1.appealrefnumber = T3.AppealRefNumber AND 
            md5(concat(
                IFNULL(T1.appealrefnumber,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lastmodified,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.decisiondate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.decisionsubmitdate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.bespokeindicator,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.bespoketargetdate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.processingstate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.linkstatus,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.casecloseddate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.pcsappealwithdrawndate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.numberofresidences,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.appealsdocumentscomplete,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.questionnairereceived,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lpaconditionsreceived,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lpaconditionsforwarded,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.statementsdue,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lpastatementsubmitted,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lpastatementforwarded,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.appellantstatementsubmitted,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.appellantstatementforwarded,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.finalcommentsdue,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lpacommentssubmitted,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lpacommentsforwarded,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.statementofcommongrounddue,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.statementofcommongroundreceived,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.appellantcommentssubmitted,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.appellantcommentsforwarded,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.thirdpartyrepsdue,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.thirdpartyrepsforwarded,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.sitenoticesent,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.proofsdue,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lpaproofssubmitted,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lpaproofsforwarded,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.appellantsproofssubmitted,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.appellantsproofsforwarded,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.areaofsiteinhectares,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.dateofdecisionifissued,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.typeofapplication,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.appealsourceindicator,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.developmentorallegation,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.amountdue,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.sitegreenbelt,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lpaapplicationreference,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lpaapplicationdate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.datenotrecoveredorderecovered,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.daterecovered,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.callindate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.caseprocess,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.caseworkmarker,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.costsappliedforindicator,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.level,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.procedureappellant,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.procedurelpa,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.proceduredetermineddate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.targetdate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.agriculturalholding,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.developmentaffectsettingoflistedbuilding,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.floorspaceinsquaremetres,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.sitegridreferenceeasting,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.sitegridreferencenorthing,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.historicbuildinggrantmade,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.incarelatestoca,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.inspectorneedtoentersite,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.isfloodinganissue,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.isthesitewithinanaonb,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.sitewithinsssi,'.')
            )) <> T3.RowID  -- same row, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.AppealRefNumber IS NULL -- new AppealRefNumber
        THEN 'Y'
    ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y' )
;

# Run tests to check integrity of data by numbers
- This script checks for the total number of current codes in the harmonised table, and compare against the numbers for new data to be added and data to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tolerance levels:** if the total amount to be added and deleted surpasses the tolerance limit, it will interrupt the process of loading the data

# Run tests to check integrity of data by comparison of codes
- This script checks for the total list of current codes in the harmonised table, and compare against the list for new data to be added and data to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
Select 
    AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    LastModified,
    DecisionDate,
    DecisionSubmitDate,
    BespokeIndicator,
    BespokeTargetDate,
    ProcessingState,
    LinkStatus,
    CaseClosedDate,
    PCSAppealWithdrawnDate,
    NumberOfResidences,
    AppealsDocumentsComplete,
    QuestionnaireReceived,
    LPAConditionsReceived,
    LPAConditionsForwarded,
    StatementsDue,
    LPAStatementSubmitted,
    LPAStatementForwarded,
    AppellantStatementSubmitted,
    AppellantStatementForwarded,
    FinalCommentsDue,
    LPACommentsSubmitted,
    LPACommentsForwarded,
    StatementOfCommonGroundDue,
    StatementOfCommonGroundReceived,
    AppellantCommentsSubmitted,
    AppellantCommentsForwarded,
    ThirdPartyRepsDue,
    ThirdPartyRepsForwarded,
    SiteNoticeSent,
    ProofsDue,
    LPAProofsSubmitted,
    LPAProofsForwarded,
    AppellantsProofsSubmitted,
    AppellantsProofsForwarded,
    AreaOfSiteInHectares,
    DateOfDecisionIfIssued,
    TypeOfApplication,
    AppealSourceIndicator,
    DevelopmentOrAllegation,
    AmountDue,
    SiteGreenBelt,
    LPAApplicationReference,
    LPAApplicationDate,
    DateNotRecoveredOrDeRecovered,
    DateRecovered,
    CallInDate,
    CaseProcess,
    CaseworkMarker,
    CostsAppliedForIndicator,
    Level,
    ProcedureAppellant,
    ProcedureLPA,
    ProcedureDeterminedDate,
    TargetDate,
    AgriculturalHolding,
    DevelopmentAffectSettingOfListedBuilding,
    FloorSpaceInSquareMetres,
    SiteGridReferenceEasting,
    SiteGridReferenceNorthing,
    HistoricBuildingGrantMade,
    InCARelatesToCA,
    InspectorNeedToEnterSite,
    IsFloodingAnIssue,
    IsTheSiteWithinAnAONB,
    SiteWithinSSSI,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive

From casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    LastModified,
    DecisionDate,
    DecisionSubmitDate,
    BespokeIndicator,
    BespokeTargetDate,
    ProcessingState,
    LinkStatus,
    CaseClosedDate,
    PCSAppealWithdrawnDate,
    NumberOfResidences,
    AppealsDocumentsComplete,
    QuestionnaireReceived,
    LPAConditionsReceived,
    LPAConditionsForwarded,
    StatementsDue,
    LPAStatementSubmitted,
    LPAStatementForwarded,
    AppellantStatementSubmitted,
    AppellantStatementForwarded,
    FinalCommentsDue,
    LPACommentsSubmitted,
    LPACommentsForwarded,
    StatementOfCommonGroundDue,
    StatementOfCommonGroundReceived,
    AppellantCommentsSubmitted,
    AppellantCommentsForwarded,
    ThirdPartyRepsDue,
    ThirdPartyRepsForwarded,
    SiteNoticeSent,
    ProofsDue,
    LPAProofsSubmitted,
    LPAProofsForwarded,
    AppellantsProofsSubmitted,
    AppellantsProofsForwarded,
    AreaOfSiteInHectares,
    DateOfDecisionIfIssued,
    TypeOfApplication,
    AppealSourceIndicator,
    DevelopmentOrAllegation,
    AmountDue,
    SiteGreenBelt,
    LPAApplicationReference,
    LPAApplicationDate,
    DateNotRecoveredOrDeRecovered,
    DateRecovered,
    CallInDate,
    CaseProcess,
    CaseworkMarker,
    CostsAppliedForIndicator,
    Level,
    ProcedureAppellant,
    ProcedureLPA,
    ProcedureDeterminedDate,
    TargetDate,
    AgriculturalHolding,
    DevelopmentAffectSettingOfListedBuilding,
    FloorSpaceInSquareMetres,
    SiteGridReferenceEasting,
    SiteGridReferenceNorthing,
    HistoricBuildingGrantMade,
    InCARelatesToCA,
    InspectorNeedToEnterSite,
    IsFloodingAnIssue,
    IsTheSiteWithinAnAONB,
    SiteWithinSSSI,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim
WHERE AppealRefNumber IN (SELECT AppealRefNumber FROM casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_new WHERE AllAppealsAdditionalDataID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

# View casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsAdditionalDataID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim AS Target
USING casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.AllAppealsAdditionalDataID = Target.AllAppealsAdditionalDataID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim

INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AppealRefNumber NULLS LAST) AS AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    LastModified,
    DecisionDate,
    DecisionSubmitDate,
    BespokeIndicator,
    BespokeTargetDate,
    ProcessingState,
    LinkStatus,
    CaseClosedDate,
    PCSAppealWithdrawnDate,
    NumberOfResidences,
    AppealsDocumentsComplete,
    QuestionnaireReceived,
    LPAConditionsReceived,
    LPAConditionsForwarded,
    StatementsDue,
    LPAStatementSubmitted,
    LPAStatementForwarded,
    AppellantStatementSubmitted,
    AppellantStatementForwarded,
    FinalCommentsDue,
    LPACommentsSubmitted,
    LPACommentsForwarded,
    StatementOfCommonGroundDue,
    StatementOfCommonGroundReceived,
    AppellantCommentsSubmitted,
    AppellantCommentsForwarded,
    ThirdPartyRepsDue,
    ThirdPartyRepsForwarded,
    SiteNoticeSent,
    ProofsDue,
    LPAProofsSubmitted,
    LPAProofsForwarded,
    AppellantsProofsSubmitted,
    AppellantsProofsForwarded,
    AreaOfSiteInHectares,
    DateOfDecisionIfIssued,
    TypeOfApplication,
    AppealSourceIndicator,
    DevelopmentOrAllegation,
    AmountDue,
    SiteGreenBelt,
    LPAApplicationReference,
    LPAApplicationDate,
    DateNotRecoveredOrDeRecovered,
    DateRecovered,
    CallInDate,
    CaseProcess,
    CaseworkMarker,
    CostsAppliedForIndicator,
    Level,
    ProcedureAppellant,
    ProcedureLPA,
    ProcedureDeterminedDate,
    TargetDate,
    AgriculturalHolding,
    DevelopmentAffectSettingOfListedBuilding,
    FloorSpaceInSquareMetres,
    SiteGridReferenceEasting,
    SiteGridReferenceNorthing,
    HistoricBuildingGrantMade,
    InCARelatesToCA,
    InspectorNeedToEnterSite,
    IsFloodingAnIssue,
    IsTheSiteWithinAnAONB,
    SiteWithinSSSI,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_changed_rows;
This last cell is just to check count of rows between source and target on first load, to be deleted!
